about_the_game:
Introducing our captivating new game, a random dungeon maze generator where your wits and reflexes will be put to the ultimate test! In this thrilling adventure, your primary goal is to reach the end of the maze as quickly as possible—except in Endless Mode, where the objective is to survive and conquer up to level 99 without meeting your demise.

The game features three exciting modes:

  • Default Mode: Navigate through the dungeon with 1-3 enemies in hot pursuit. Your mission is to reach the end of the maze while evading your relentless adversaries.

  • No Enemy Mode: Similar to Default Mode, but without the enemies. It's all about finding the quickest route to the maze's exit and setting a new record time.

  • Endless Mode: Face the challenge of endless mazes, each with 1-3 enemies hunting you down. The goal is to progress through as many levels as possible, up to level 99, without getting killed.

Embark on an epic journey, hone your skills, and see how far you can go in this adrenaline-pumping dungeon adventure!

In this thrilling adventure, your primary goal is to reach the end of the maze as quickly as possible—except in Endless Mode, where the objective is to survive and conquer up to level 99 without meeting your demise.

  • No Enemy Mode: Similar to Default Mode, but without the enemies. It's all about finding the quickest route to the maze's exit and setting a new record time.

  • Endless Mode: Face the challenge of endless mazes, each with 1-3 enemies hunting you down. The goal is to progress through as many levels as possible, up to level 99, without getting killed.

Embark on an epic journey, hone your skills, and see how far you can go in this adrenaline-pumping dungeon adventure!

name: Eternal Halls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500T
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 745 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: GTX 745

short_description: Embark on a thrilling adventure in our random dungeon maze generator! Race against time to reach the end of each maze. Choose from Default, No Enemy, or Endless Mode, where you can strive to conquer up to level 99. Can you survive the challenge?
